Jumbotron.title: Ka anyị jikọta aka luso Nje korona ọgụ

Definition.heading: Gịnị bụ Nje korona (a na-akpọ kwa ya Covid 19)?
Definition.description: Nje korona (COVID 19) bụ ọrịa na-efe efe nke si na nje malitere ọhụrụ na Wuhan, China n'ọnwa Disemba, 2019.  Ọrịa a na-akpata ọrịa mgbochi ikuume ma nwee ihe nrịbaama dịka ụkwara, ahụ ọkụ nakwa n'ebe ọ ka njọ, nsogbu ikuba ume ime.
Definition.howItSpreads: Ọrịa nje Korona na-agbasa site na nnọkọta nso onye ebughị ya nọdewere onye bu ya mgbe ọ kwara ụkwara maọbụ zee uzere. Ọ na-agbasakwa mgbe mmadụ metụrụ ihe njé ahụ dị aka, mgbe ahụ metụ anya, imi maọbụ ọnụ ha aka.

Symptoms.heading: Symtoms of Corona Virus
Symptoms.actionText: I nwere ihe nrịbama? Atụla ụjọ

content.title: Kwọọ ma hichaa aka gị nke ọma oge niile
content.description: Iji ncha na mmiri maọbụ ihe nkwọaka nwere akọhọlụ kwọọ aka nke ọma ga-egbu nje dị gị n'aka.

content.title: Nọpụ iche
content.description: Mgbe ọbụla mmadụ na-akwa ụkwara maọbụ eze uzere, zere onye ahụ site n'ịnọ n'ebe tere aka, ọ dịkarịa ala otu mita.

content.title: Zere imetụ anya, imi na ọnụ aka
content.description: Aka na-emetụ ọtụtụ ihe nwere ike metụ na nje. Mgbe ọ batara n'aka, o nwere ike metụ anya, imi maọbụ ọnụ.

content.title: Soro usoro nkurume dị ọcha
content.description: Nke a gụnyere ikpuchi imi gị site n'iji ubuaka gị maọbụ jiri akwụkwọ nhichaike mgbe ị na-akwa ụkwara maọbụ eze uzere. I mechaa, tụfuo akwụkwọ nhichaike ahụ ozugbo.

content.myth: Ọrịa bụ nke ndị bara ọgaranya
content.fact: Nje korona na-emetụta onye ọbụla n'agbanyeghị ma o nwere ego maọbụ na o nweghị. Nje a na-esi n'aka ndị bu ya, fere n'aka ndị ebughị ya.

content.myth: Nje Korona anaghị egbu ndị isiojii
content.fact: Nje korona nwere ike metụta ma gbuo onye ọcha nakwa onye isi ojii. N'eziokwu, e nweela ọtụtụ ndị isiojii na ndị ọcha nwụrụla n'ihi na ha butere nje a.

content.myth: Ịṅụ mmanya na-aba n'anya ga-egbochi m ibute Nje Korona
content.fact: Ịṅụ mmanya na-aba n'anya agaghị egbochi gị ibute Nje Korona, kama ọ ga-akpatara gị nnukwu nsogbu. Ịṅụ oke mmanya na-aba n'anya nwere ike kpatara gị ọrịa ọzọ ma mee ka ahụ gị ghara isi ike.

content.myth: Naanị ndị kàrà nka ka Nje korona na-enweta
content.fact: Onye ọbụla n'agbanyeghị afọ ndụ nwere ike bute ya. Ndị kàrà nka nakwa ndị nwere ọrịa ndị dika (ọrịa mgbochi ikuku, ọrịa mamịrị, ọrịa obi) ga-ebuteli ya ngwangwa.

content.myth: Ịwụsa mmanya na-aba n'anya nakwa ọgwụ klorin n'ahụ gị ga-egbu Nje Corona
content.fact: Mba. Mmanya na-aba n'anya nakwa Klorin agaghị egbu Nje Korona banyerela mmadụ ahụ. Akọhọl na Klorin nwere ike nye aka mgbochie ya mgbe ọ na-abịabeghị.

content.myth: Ọgwụ antibayotik na-egbochi Nje Korona nke ọma
content.fact: Mba. Antibayotik anaghị arụgide nje kama arụrụ baktéríà. Ejila antibayotik dịka ọgwụgwọ nakwa mgbochi nje korona

content.question: Nje na-akpata Korona, o si n'ikuku eje?
content.answer: E nwebeghị ihe a chọpụtara nke na-egosị na nje korona na-esi n'ikuku. Ọrịa ọhụrụ a na-esi na nkuume nke na-agbasa site n'ụkwara nakwa uzere nke onye bu ya maọbụ ọnụ mmiri maọbụ imi. Iji chebe onwe gị, kwọọ aka gị nke ọma site n'iji mmiri nkwọaka nwere akọhọl  maọbụ jiri ncha na mmiri kwọọ aka gị nke ọma.

content.question: Mmadụ o nwere ike bute nje corona site n'aka onye enweghị ihe nrịbama?
content.answer: Ọrịa Nje Korona na-esitekari n'aka onye bu ya fere n'aka onye ọzọ. Mmadụ nwere ike bute ya n'aka onye enweghị ihe nrịbaama. Mmadụ nwere ike bute ya site n'imetụ ọnụ akụrụngwa maọbụ ihe njé ahụ dị aka.

content.question: Kedụ onye nwere ike bute ọrịa ọjọọ a?
content.answer: Nje Korona na-emetụta ndị mmadụ, ndị agadi nakwa ndị na-arịabu ọrịa dịka (ọbara mgbali elu, ọrịa obi, ọrịa ọgịrịga, kansa na ọrịa mamịrị) nwere ike bute ya karịsịa.

content.question: E nwere ọgwụ e ji agwọ nje corona?
content.answer:
Ọ dịbeghị. Ka ọ dị ugbua o nwebeghị ọgwụ a rụpụtara iji gbochie nje corona. N'ihi ya, ndị o metụtara ga-anara ọgwụgwọ site n'ihe nrịbama ji ha. Ndị na-arịa nnukwu ọrịa kwesịrị ịnọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ. Ọtụtụ ndị bu nje a na-agbake. Ekele dịrị ndị na-enye aka.
A ka na-enyocha ọgwụ a rụpụtara iji gwọọ nje a. A ka na-anwale ha. WHO na-agba mbọ ịhazi nrụpụta ọgwụ dị iche iche maka mgbochi na ọgwụgwọ nje korona.

content.question: Kedụ oge ọ na-ewe iji mara na mmadụ bu nje Korona?
content.answer: Nke a na-egosị oge mmadụ butere nje a nakwa mgbe ihe nrịbaama na-egosị ya n'ahụ. Nke a na-amalite site n'otu ụbọchị ruo ụbọchị iri na anọ, mana karịsịa ụbọchị ise. Anyị ga-eme ka ị mara ka ihe si kwụrụ ka oge na-aga.

content.question: Kedụ oge nje korona na-anọ n'elu?
content.answer:
A maghị oge ole nje na-ebute korona na-anọ n'elu.
I chee na elu akụrụngwa nwere ike bute nje, jiri ihe nhicha gbuo nje, chebe onwe gị na ndị ọzọ. Jiri mmiri nwere akọhọl kwọọ aka gị, werekwa mmiri na ncha kwọọ aka gị. Emetụla anya gị, ọnụ gị na imi gị aka.

content.question: M ga-anwụ ma m bute nje?
content.answer: Nje korona anaghị egbu mmadụ ozugbo. Ndị nwere COVID 19 na-enweta ihe nrịbaama nke gụnyere nkuume na ahụ ọkụ ihe dịka ụbọchị ise ruo isii mgbe e butechara ya ( ọ pụtara na nrịbaama ya na-abịa ụbọchị ise ruo isii, dịka otu ụbọchị ruo ụbọchị iri na anọ). Ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ nwere nje Korona na-arịa obere ọrịa ma gbakee.

content.question: Kedụ otu m nwere ike isi nye aka ma luso nje korona ọgụ?
content.answer: Mee ka a mara ozugbo ị chọpụtara na mmadụ bu ya. I chee na  ị nọ na mba ébé e nwere nje korona maọbụ hụ onye nwere ihe nrịbaama dịka oke ahụ ọkụ, mgbapịa akpịrị, ụkwara maọbụ nsogbu ikuume. Ọ dị mkpa na ị gara mee nnyocha ahụ.

content.question: Kedụ mgbe nje a ga-akwụsị?
content.answer: O nweghị onye ma oge ọ ga-abụ mana ihe dị mma bụ na ụwa niile jikọtara aka ọnụ na-achọ ụzọ isi wete nje a n'isi njedebe.

Footer.share: Zigara ndị ezinaụlọ na ndị enyi

Emergency.heading: Chọta akaraekwentị ndị gbatagbata nakwa ebe a na-enyocha ahụ dị gị nso.

Checker.heading: Nwalee ma i nwere ihe ize ndụ maọbụ na i nweghị

HighRisk.headline: You're on High Risk
HighRisk.description: Ihe nrịbaama na akụkọ njem mmadụ nwere ike gosị mbido nje korona

prescription.title: Ihe a ga-eme iji wedata ihe ize ndụ dị n'ibute nje
content: Nọrọ n'ụlọ ma ghara ịpụ ezi ọ gwụla o nwere ihe gbata gbata dapụtara
Nọọrọ onwe gị ọbụladị na be gị
Wụsa mmanụ mgbochi n'iboụzọ, windo, usekwu, na mbara ebe na-ahụ
Na-aṅụ mmiri mgbe mgbe ma rie ezigbo nri e siri nke ọma nakwa nri a kwọrọ aka wee sie
Jiri mmiri na ncha akwọ aka gị nke ọma oge niile ya dịkarịa ala minit iri abụọ
Na-ekpuchi imi gị (ma mgbe ị nọ n'ụlọ) ma mgbe ị na-akwa ụkwara maọbụ ezi imi nakwa mgbe ị na-elekọta onye ọrịa

Quiz.question: Ị gara na mba nwere nje Korona nke ukwuu n'ihe dịka ụbọchị 14-20 gara aga?

options.answer: Ee, agara m mba nwere ọtụtụ ndị bu nje Korona
Mba, agbabeghị m mba nwere ọtụtụ ndị bu nje Korona

Quiz.question: Gị na onye e mere nnyocha ma chọpụta na o bu nje Korona anọkọtala ọnụ ihe dịka ụbọchị 14-20 gara aga?
I nwere otu n'ime ọrịa ndị a?
Kedụ afọ ị dị na ya?

options.answer: Ọ karịrị afọ maọbụ afọ 65 kpọmkwem

Quiz.question: Ahụ gị ọ na-ekpo ọkụ karịa 37 digrii sesius?
Ị na-enwetakarị ihe nrịbaama nke ọbụla na ndị a?

options.answer: Ụkwara ebighị ebi na mgbapịa akpịrị

Quiz.question: Ihe nrịbaama ọ dị ọtụtụ nke na ọ na-esiri gị ike ime ọtụtụ Ihe ndị ọzọ?

options.answer: Ee- ọ na-esiri m ike ime ihe ọzọ m na-emebu
Mba- ahụ dị m mma ime ihe m na-emebu

Checker.FamilyAndFriends: Gwa ndị ezinaụlọ gị na ndị enyi gị ka ha gaa nwalee ahụ ha. Nyere ha aka ka ha chọpụta ihe nrịbaama ma nweta ahụike dị mma!
Checker.Disclaimer: Enwebeghị nchọcha ahụike zuru ezu. Nke a nwere ike gụnye nchekwa pụọ na nje korona. Ozi ahụ na-enye aka ike ka ndị mmadụ mara ihe na-eme ọ bụghị ịnọchị anya ntuziaka dọkịta.
